bug.author: asimay
bug.summary: the label class numbers in tools are not accordance with the ground truth.
bug.description:
example: the color and label number is not same, <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8703449/39977267-4e867522-576b-11e8-9e84-97ef1a1bfd04.png></denchmark-link>
but when generate ground truth, the class number is same. <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8703449/39977374-2a5ae20e-576c-11e8-9261-3779e3afbaaa.png></denchmark-link>

comments.comment: This seems a similar problem as <denchmark-link:https://github.com/wkentaro/labelme/issues/52>#52</denchmark-link> . Could you provide below information and your json file for debug? <denchmark-code>pip freeze labelme --version </denchmark-code>

sorry for late.

In your output of pip freeze, it says the version of labelme is old 2.13.0, so please upgrade it to the latest one. <denchmark-code>Keras==1.2.1 labelme==2.13.0 lazy-object-proxy==1.3.1 </denchmark-code>
Please request to reopen if you need.
